model

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains attributes, relationships, and methods of a grid.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Angelica Corrales Quevedo, https://github.com/AngelicaCorrales, Keren Lopez Cordoba, https://github.com/KerenLopez
    Based on the linked matrix of https://github.com/seyerman

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid(java.lang.String players,
            int snakes,
            int ladders,
            int rows,
            int columns)
        This is the constructor of the class.
        name: Grid.
        pre: the variables players, snakes, ladders,rows, columns are already initialized.
        post: the attributes and relationships of the class have been initialized. The grid has been created. The snakes and ladders have been added to the grid.
        Parameters:
        players - Is a String variable that contains symbols of the players for the game. players!=null and players!="".
        snakes - Is an integer variable that contains the number of snakes for the game. snakes greater than 0.
        ladders - Is an integer variable that contains the number of ladders for the game. ladders greater than 0.
        rows - Is an integer variable that contains the number of rows for the game. rows greater than 1.
        columns - Is an integer variable that contains the number of columns for the game. columns greater than 1.

    • Method Detail

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        This method gets the number of rows of the grid.
        name: getRows.
        post: the number of rows has been gotten.
        Returns:
        an integer specifying rows, the number of rows of the grid.

        This method gets the number of columns of the grid.

        post: the number of columns has been gotten.
        Returns:
        an integer specifying columns, the number of columns of the grid.

        public Player getWinner()
        This method gets the winner of the game.
        name: getWinner.
        post: the winner of the game has been gotten.
        Returns:
        a Player specifying winner, the winner of the game.

      • addSnakes

        private void addSnakes(int snakes)
        This method adds snakes to the grid.
        name: addSnakes.
        pre: snakes is already initialized.
        post: snakes have been added to the grid.
        Parameters:
        snakes - Is an integer variable that contains the number of snakes for the game. snakes greater than 0.

      • addLadders

        private void addLadders(int ladders)
        This method adds ladders to the grid.
        name: addLadders.
        pre: ladders is already initialized.
        post: ladders have been added to the grid.
        Parameters:
        ladders - Is an integer variable that contains the number of ladders for the game. ladders greater than 0.

      • searchSquare

        private Square searchSquare(int i,
                            int j,
                            Square square)
        This method searches the square according to specified coordinates.
        name: searchSquare.
        pre: i, j, and square are already initialized.
        post: the searched square has been found.
        Parameters:
        i - Is an integer variable that contains the row of the searched square. i greater than or equal to 0.
        j - Is an integer variable that contains the column of the searched square. j greater than or equal to 0.
        square - Is a Square object that references the first square of the row. square!=null.
        Returns:
        a Square specifying square, the searched square.

      • createGrid

        private void createGrid()
        This method creates the grid for the game.
        name: createGrid.
        post: the grid has been created.

      • createRow

        private void createRow(int i,
                       int j,
                       Square currentFirstRow)
        This method creates rows of the grid.
        name: createRow.
        pre: i, j, and currentFirstRow are already initialized.
        post: rows have been created.
        Parameters:
        i - Is an integer variable that contains the row for the new square in the column of the row. i greater than or equal to 0.
        j - Is an integer variable that contains the column for the first square in the row. j equal to 0.
        currentFirstRow - Is a Square object that references the first square of the row. currentFirstRow!=null.

      • createCol

        private void createCol(int i,
                       int j,
                       Square prev,
                       Square rowDown)
        This method creates a row, column by column, of the grid.
        name: createCol.
        pre: i, j, and prev are already initialized.
        post: the row has been created.
        Parameters:
        i - Is an integer variable that contains the row for the new square in the column of the row. i greater than or equal to 0.
        j - Is an integer variable that contains the column for the new square in the row. j greater than or equal to 0.
        prev - Is a Square object that references the previous square of the row. prev!=null
        rowDown - Is a Square object that references the square down the previous square of the row.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(int num,
                       char player)
        This method moves a player from square to square.
        name: movePlayer.
        pre: num, and player are already initialized.
        post: the player has been moved on the grid.
        Parameters:
        num - Is an integer variable that contains the number obtained from throwing the die. num from 1 to 6.
        player - Is a char variable that contains the player's symbol. player=='*' or player== '!' or player== 'O' or player== 'X' or player=='%' or player== '$' or player=='#' or player== '+' or player==38.

      • searchSquareByNumber

        private Square searchSquareByNumber(int num,
                                    Square square,
                                    Square squareDown)
        This method searches the square by its square number.
        name: searchSquareByNumber.
        pre: num, square, and squareDown are already initialized.
        post: the searched square has been found.
        Parameters:
        num - Is an integer variable that contains the number of the searched square. num greater than 0.
        square - Is a Square object that references the first square of the row. square!=null.
        squareDown - Is a Square object that references the square down the first square of the row. squareDown!=null.
        Returns:
        a Square specifying square, the searched square.

      • searchPlayerInSquare

        private Square searchPlayerInSquare(char player,
                                    Square square,
                                    Square squareDown)
        This method searches the square that contains the player.
        name: searchPlayerInSquare.
        pre: player, square, and squareDown are already initialized.
        post: the searched square has been found.
        Parameters:
        player - Is a char variable that contains the player's symbol. player=='*' or player== '!' or player== 'O' or player== 'X' or player=='%' or player== '$' or player=='#' or player== '+' or player==38.
        square - Is a Square object that references the first square of the row. square!=null.
        squareDown - Is a Square object that references the square down the first square of the row. squareDown!=null.
        Returns:
        a Square specifying square, the searched square.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method obtains a String with the numbered grid, with snakes and ladders.
        name: toString.
        post: the grid has been obtained.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String specifying msg, the numbered grid, with snakes and ladders.

        post: rows has been obtained.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        post: the grid has been obtained.
        Returns:
